doc:
Sam Waterston https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sam_Waterston 0 Samuel Atkinson Waterston (born November 15, 1940) is an American actor, producer, and director. Among other roles, he is noted for his portrayal of Sydney Schanberg in The Killing Fields (1984), for which he received an Academy Award nomination, and his starring role as Jack McCoy on the long-running NBC television series Law Order (1994–2010), which brought him Golden Globe and Screen Actors Guild Awards. He has been nominated for multiple Golden Globe, Screen Actors Guild, BAFTA and Emmy awards, having starred in over eighty film and television productions during his fifty-year career. He has also starred in numerous stage productions. AllMovie historian Hal Erickson characterized Waterston as having "cultivated a loyal following with his quietly charismatic, unfailingly solid performances."Waterston received a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame in 2010 and was inducted into the American Theatre Hall of Fame in 2012. Samuel_Atkinson_Waterston ( born November_15_,_1940 ) is an_American_actor , producer , and director . Among other_roles , he is_noted for his_portrayal of Sydney_Schanberg in The_Killing_Fields_(_1984_) , for which he received an_Academy_Award_nomination , and his_starring_role as Jack_McCoy on the_long-running_NBC_television_series_Law_(_1994 – 2010_) , which brought him Golden_Globe_and_Screen_Actors_Guild_Awards . He has_been_nominated for multiple_Golden_Globe , Screen_Actors_Guild_,_BAFTA_and_Emmy_awards , having_starred in over_eighty_film_and_television_productions during his_fifty-year_career . He has_also_starred in numerous_stage_productions . AllMovie_historian_Hal_Erickson characterized Waterston as having " cultivated a_loyal following with his_quietly_charismatic , unfailingly_solid_performances . " Waterston received a_star on the_Hollywood_Walk of Fame in 2010 and was_inducted into the_American_Theatre_Hall of Fame in 2012 .
